price: Kuma Muka sanya su shugabanni, sunã shiryarwa da umurnin Mu. Kuma Muka yi wahayi zuwa gare su da ayyukan alhẽri da tsayar da salla da bãyar da zakka. Kuma sun kasance mãsu bauta gare Mu.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَهۡدُونَ بِأَمۡرِنَا وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِمۡ فِعۡلَ ٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ وَإِقَامَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَإِيتَآءَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةِۖ وَكَانُواْ لَنَا عَٰبِدِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnāhum a-immatan yahdūna bi-amrinā wa-awḥaynā ilayhim fiʿ'la al-khayrāti wa-iqāma al-ṣalati waītāa al-zakati wakānū lanā ʿābidīna
